mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room WHERE current_count < capacity AND status = 'AVAILABLE' AND (department = #{department} OR ward_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{department}, '%'))
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET current_count = current_count + 1, status = CASE WHEN current_count + 1 >= capacity THEN 'FULL' ELSE 'AVAILABLE' END WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room ORDER BY room_no ASC
